quest.name: Familiar Fate
journal:
 Quest Sync
Charmion has one last question to ask you.

Charmion, it seems, has saved her most philosophical question for last: how do you feel about your place in the grand scheme of things? To help you better understand her own calling in life, the inquisitive observer bids you follow her northwest to the Anagnorisis archives.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
The archives in question contain rows of what appear to be administrative records. Charmion has given you leave to browse these documents at your leisure...
Upon perusing the documentation, you discover a staggering number of observation logs─many of them written in Overseer Sokles's hand. Charmion waits nearby, eager to hear your thoughts.

Now that you have some inkling of the sheer volume of the overseer's work, Charmion admits to some trepidation at being chosen as Sokles's successor. For his part, however, Sokles has full confidence in her knowledge and ability, and credits you for helping prepare the way for his “return to the star”...

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Forename, I feel we've grown to understand each other...

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: But there is one last thing I wish to know.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: As you've seen, our purpose is to improve life on this star, and we each have our own way of approaching that purpose.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Familiars, too, exist for a reason─often a very specific one─and I just... I wonder what you feel about your place in the grand scheme of things.

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: Charmion, perhaps you can provide our friend here with an example of what you mean. Such a nebulous question requires a more recognizable foundation from which to answer.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Yes, you're right, of course! We must not skip the journey in our haste to reach the destination.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Where to begin? Broadly speaking, we study the wisdom and magicks of our forebears, and choose our path as our interests and talents begin to crystallize.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Even among the observers of Anagnorisis, however, Overseer Sokles and I share a similar calling...

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: ...Again, it may be more beneficial to simply show you what I mean. Please accompany me to the archives in the northwest.

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: Never a dull moment with Charmion, is there? Still, her boundless enthusiasm is what makes her such a fine observer.

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: The exchange of knowledge is quite mutual, I assure you!

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: This is where we keep all of the administrative records.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Any of these documents will help give you an idea of what we consider to be our defining purpose. Feel free to browse.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: I shall just be...awaiting you outside.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: These books appear to contain detailed observation logs. The name “Sokles” is written on each of the spines.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You pick up the log and flip to a random page...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Today there was an incident involving the hippokampos. The creature is extremely territorial, and four observers sustained light to severe injuries from water-based magicks as a result of their perceived intrusion into its domain.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A report has been sent to the Words of Lahabrea outlining the dangers inherent in continued observation of their nominated subject, and the intent to shift our focus to the smaller─and considerably less aggressive─hippe.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A stack of half-finished observation logs. Judging by the penmanship, the author is someone other than Sokles.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. Did you find the observation logs enlightening?

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Overseer Sokles has built up quite a library, hasn't he? He's logged comprehensive observations on every living being in Anagnorisis─not only objective physical descriptions, but also his personal thoughts and impressions.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: And that's why I'm here: to carry on the overseer's invaluable work.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: When it comes to the continued success of Anagnorisis, our purposes are very much aligned.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: I cannot help but worry, however, that I lack the same degree of perception and ability; that I am unfit for the task I have chosen. Even being in the same room as those logs is enough to make me feel uncomfortable.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: My insistence that you examine your purpose was, I think, born from the trepidation which surrounds my own.

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: (-???-)An uncertainty you need not feel.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: Overseer Sokles!

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: As one of our newest arrivals, you have ever been quick to doubt yourself.

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: Yet you were able to guide Forename here on an engaging tour through the intricacies of our duties, which clearly demonstrates the depths of your understanding.

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: If all I wanted was someone to emulate my work, why, I would simply continue doing it myself. No, the reason I asked you to assume my role is because I believe you can take our projects in new and novel directions.

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: Raising you as a competent successor is the final step of my purpose in life. Do me proud, Charmion─it is your growth, your efforts, which will facilitate my return to the star.

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: I will do my best, Overseer!

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: But don't be in too much of a rush to leave us! There are still so many things I need you to teach me...

dialogue.name: CHARMION
dialogue.text: ...And speaking of teaching! Thank you, Forename, for this wonderful and enriching visit. It's been a pleasure learning about you─not to mention a few things about myself!

dialogue.name: SOKLES
dialogue.text: Yes, you also have my gratitude for the part you've played in training my young colleague. You are welcome to return whenever you wish!
